Title: Don't teach. Educate - Navin Reddy | The Developer's Journey Episode 8
Description:
Join us on The Developer‚Äôs Journey, where we dive deep into the candid stories of software engineers navigating the highs and lows of their careers. From overcoming challenges to celebrating wins, this series offers an honest glimpse into the realities of life in tech.

Navin Reddy, Telusko, shares his journey from starting out posting videos on YouTube as a side gig, to becoming a full-time content creator. He emphasizes the importance of engaging with your audience, keeping it fun and educating for a diverse audience which makes the tech community stronger!

Whether you‚Äôre a seasoned developer or just starting out, this story will inspire and resonate with you.
